https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/1rIZV3X1NeG99jeJRaDXtKHt9W.jpg Grassroots activists in the Philippines are spurred into action when a local transgender woman is found dead in a motel room with a 19-year-old U.S. marine as the leading suspect. As they demand answers and a just trial, hidden histories of U.S. colonization come bubbling to the surface. Call Her Ganda
